official_title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the last Sunday in April of 1978 as National Grandparent's Day.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the last Sunday in April 1978, as "National Grandparent's Day."

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the last Sunday in April of 1978 as National Grandparent's Day.
